home.homeTextHeroPrg: World Innovation Group ile konfor ve ilham yaratın

carAndMotorbike.title: Car and motorcycle
carAndMotorbike.description: Arabaların ve motosikletlerin onarimımı bakımı, yüksek kaliteli yedek parça ve aletler gerektirir.

electronics.title: electronics
electronics.description: Ev ve ofis elektronikleri hayatımızı büyük ölçüde kolaylaştırır, konfor ve üretkenliği artırır.

diyAndTools.title: DIY and tools
diyAndTools.description: World Innovation Group şirketi, Kendin Yap projeleri ingeniş biraç ve malzeme yelpazesi sunmaktadır.

clothing.title: Clothing
clothing.description: Firmmız her durum and mevsim için geniş bir yelpazede modaya uygun ve kaliteli giyim sunmaktadır.

computing.title: Bilgi islem
computing.description: World Innovation Group offers everything you need for your computing needs.

textile.title: Textile
textile.description: The World Innovation Group company offers a wide range of textile products for different needs.

houseAppliances.title: domestic appliances
houseAppliances.description: The World Innovation Group company offers a wide range of household appliances for your home.

foodProducts.title: Groceries
foodProducts.description: The World Innovation Group company offers a variety of high-quality food products.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: Our company specializes in the wholesale of high-quality textiles, household goods and food.

ourMission.title: Our task
ourMission.description: At World Innovation Group, we strive to create comfort and style in every home and provide our customers with the best interior design and dining solutions.

ourPhilosophy.title: our philosophy
ourPhilosophy.description: Our company's philosophy is based on three main principles: honesty, transparency and constant pursuit of excellence.

dynamism.title: dynamics
dynamism.description: We are evolving at the rapid pace of e-commerce.

innovation.title: innovation
innovation.description: Innovation is the core of our strategy.

passionForEcommerce.title: Passionate about e-commerce
passionForEcommerce.description: Our passion is online, multi-channel and international sales.

ourStory.title: Our history
ourStory.description: We founded our company with the goal of connecting manufacturers with customers.

whyChooseUs.title: Why choose us
whyChooseUs.description: We offer high-quality products in three main categories: textiles, household goods and food.
qualities: Quality: We only work with trustworthy suppliers, ensuring high standards for every production unit.
Variety: A wide range of products allows you to meet different needs and tastes.
Trust: We value long-term relationships with customers and partners by offering reliable and effective solutions.

whyServiceBest.title: Why is our service the best?
whyServiceBest.description: We pride ourselves on providing our customers with exceptional service that sets us apart from our competitors.
points: Individual approach: We understand that every customer is unique and offer personalized solutions tailored to your specific needs and expectations.
Professional support: Our team of experts is always available to answer your questions and give you qualified recommendations on product selection.
Fast and reliable delivery: We ensure timely delivery of goods, so you can rely on us in any situation.
Quality Assurance: We stand behind the quality of our products and services and offer guarantees and the option of refunds if necessary.
Flexible terms of cooperation: We strive to make our cooperation convenient and profitable for you by offering flexible payment terms and tailored offers.

advantages.title: Good quality
advantages.description: Products from trusted and certified manufacturers.

advantages.title: Large selection
advantages.description: Products for all needs and preferences.

advantages.title: competitive prices
advantages.description: Great offers, flexible discount system and regular promotions.

advantages.title: Professional support
advantages.description: Advice and support from qualified specialists.

advantages.title: Fast delivery
advantages.description: Prompt delivery and favorable payment terms.

advantages.title: Reliability and trust
advantages.description: Long-term relationships and an individual approach to each customer.

service.goalText: Our goal is to exceed your expectations and make working with us as pleasant and efficient as possible.
